SELECT a.CPLNT_ID ,DATE_FORMAT(a.OCR_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS OCR_DTM ,DATE_FORMAT(a.APPL_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS APPL_DTM ,a.ROUT_NM ,c.COMP_NM ,a.VHC_NO ,a.CPLNT_TYPE ,a.GPS_X ,a.GPS_Y ,a.VHC_ID ,a.NODE_ID ,a.ROUT_ID ,a.JUDGE ,a.JUDG_ORG ,a.JUDG_TYPE ,a.JUDG_DESC ,DATE_FORMAT(a.UPD_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS UPD_DTM ,DATE_FORMAT(a.OPER_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS OPER_DT ,DATE_FORMAT(a.JUDG_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS JUDG_DTM ,a.ALLOC_NO ,a.OPER_SN ,a.CPLNT_CONTS ,a.CPLNT_NM ,CONVERT(AES_DECRYPT(a.CPLNT_PHONE, HEX(SHA2('TRACOM', 512))) USING UTF8) CPLNT_PHONE ,d.NODE_NM FROM BRT_CPLNT_HIS a LEFT JOIN BMS_VHC_MST b ON a.VHC_ID = b.VHC_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_TRANSCOMP_MST c ON b.COMP_ID = c.COMP_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_NODE_MST d ON a.NODE_ID = d.NODE_ID
AND ROUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || a.VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || a.CPLNT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND ROUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND a.VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND a.CPLNT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(APPL_DTM, '%Y%m%d') between #{APPL_DTM} and #{APPL_DTM}
ORDER BY a.CPLNT_ID
